scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "npm run start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000/ && ELECTRON_DEV=true electron ."
scripts.electron:osx: npm run clear:osx && npm run build && electron-packager . --icon=build/favicon.icns --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --prune=true --asar --out=platforms/osx
scripts.electron:win: npm run clear:win && npm run build && electron-packager . --icon=build/favicon.ico --platform=win32 --arch=ia32,x64 --prune=true --asar --out=platforms/win
scripts.electron:nix: npm run clear:nix && npm run build && electron-packager . --icon=build/favicon.png --platform=linux --arch=ia32,x64 --prune=true --asar --out=platforms/nix
scripts.electron:deb: npm run electron:nix && electron-installer-debian --src platforms/nix/parsec-gui-linux-x64/ --dest dist/installers/ --arch amd64
